text:
Fernando Eid (born 20 June 1992) is a Bolivian journalist and media personality. He currently reports for the morning magazine Al Día and television station Bolivisión.
Career.
Eid began his career in media in 2009. At that time, he was a radio host on Bolivian stations such as Radio Disney, Radio Activa and Radio El Debe. He dedicated himself to music from 2014 to 2017. He was in programs Tweeners (ATB), Chicostation (Unitel), El Mañanero, Pura Vida and Singing for a Dream (Red Uno), PAT News and Noticia De La Hora (RED PAT). Since September 2019 he has been the presenter of the magazine Al Día and BOLIVISIÓN.
